trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref uid="langword_csharp_try" name="try" href=""></xref> block with any number of <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> clauses and, optionally, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_finally" name="finally" href=""></xref> block.
CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement can be used to represent a `try/``catch` block of code.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.TryStatements%2A> property contains the statements to execute within a `try` block.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.CatchClauses%2A> property contains the `catch` clauses to handle caught exceptions.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.FinallyStatements%2A> property contains the statements to execute within a `finally` block.
> [!NOTE] > Not all languages support `try/catch` blocks.

Call the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> method with the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport?displayProperty=fullName> flag to determine whether a code generator supports `try/catch` blocks.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement"></xref> class using the specified statements for try and catch clauses.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> objects that indicate the statements to try.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref> objects that indicate the clauses to catch.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement"></xref> class using the specified statements for try, catch clauses, and finally statements.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> objects that indicate the statements to try.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref> objects that indicate the clauses to catch.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> objects that indicate the finally statements to use.
Gets the catch clauses to use.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClauseCollection"></xref> that indicates the catch clauses to use.
Gets the finally statements to use.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"></xref> that indicates the finally statements.
Gets the statements to try.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"></xref> that indicates the statements to try.
